title: IP Bank: Tokenization Platform for Japanese Anime & Manga IP
summary: Japanese Imanga, anime, gaming characters, & music is dispersed across multiple rights holders. Without a unified registry global partners cannot easilylicense Japanese IP at scale.
solution: IP Bank is a Cardano-powered enterprise tokenization platform for Japanese for manga, anime character, and music rights in  partnership with major Japanese IP rights-holders
proposer_relevant_experience:
**Sandeep Casi**

- Sandeep is senior executive with a diverse career spanning industries from automotive, manufacturing, visual effects, television broadcasting, venture capital, R&D, hardware, firmware, middleware, and software.
- His expertise includes developing advanced technologies via the use of AI, ML, Web3, Blockchain, Broadcasting technologies, CAD, CAM, FEA, Virtual Reality, and visual effects rendering pipelines, with involvement in notable projects such as Star Wars, Jurassic Park, and Titanic.
- He held significant roles at Fuji-Xerox Palo Alto Lab and successfully led many research product to market initiatives for Fujifilm in Japan and the broader Asia-Pacific region.  Post Fujifilm, he joined a boutique venture capital fund in Japan and raised millions from Japanese investors for many silicon valley companies and established their Japanese presence (Product-Market Fit, Sales).
- He spun off 30 patents from Fujifilm, raised $7 million from Japanese, Korean, and US investors for a new venture, and exited that venture in 2021.
- Sandeep  has deep connections to CxO in US, Asia, Europe, With over 18 years of experience in Japan, he is well connected within the Japanese corporate CxO circles.

[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/sandeepcasi](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sandeepcasi)

**Tomoko Takasaki**

- Senior Manager at Antler
- Nearly 20 years in the media and entertainment industry, developing deep expertise in Japan’s IP and copyright business and a clear understanding of rights-holder and creator pain points
- Built through extensive work at Horipro (leading Japanese talent agency) and agehasprings (top music creative company).
- Partners include: Sony Music / Aniplex, avex, Shueisha, Kodansha, Toei Animation and Sunrise—major IP holders in Japan’s anime and manga ecosystem

[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/tomoko\-takasaki/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tomoko-takasaki/)

**Michael Yagi \(Genun Games / Ikigai\)**

- Prior experience as senior software engineer across disciplines
- Contributed on cardano since 2021 managing projects from marketplaces, layer 2 protocols, BTC defi,
- Assisted global launch, live-ops, and publishing programs across gaming titles, managing multi-disciplinary teams and large-scale player communities
- Background in competitive gaming, esports operations, and ecosystem development for AAA franchises
- Advises studios and emerging platforms on growth strategy, partnership development, and player-centric product design

[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/michaelyagi/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelyagi/)

**Clifford Garvis \(Genun Games / Ikigai\)**

- Former senior solutions architect leading design and support of large-scale enterprise technology systems
- Extensive experience coordinating across multiple internal teams and external partners to deliver integrated, reliable solutions
- Ex-Nintendo engineer with gaming background and education
- Proven track record managing multi-stakeholder initiatives involving engineering, product, operations, and vendor ecosystems

[https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/cliff\-garvis\-5394b380/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/cliff-garvis-5394b380/)

sub_fields.description: Please provide details on the intellectual property (IP) status of your project outputs, including whether they will be released as open source or retained under another licence.
sub_fields.answer: The IP bank will be exclsive on Cardano chain and will integrate into Animoca Moca Network.  The IP rights are licesned by Antler Ibex and uses Moca network for validation in partnership with Animoca (The IP bank named Great Wave is a Joint-Venture between Ibex and Animoca Brands) .  This platfoem thus is sole property of the rights holders and thus needs to be under the IP protection of Antler Ibex.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Describe your established collaborations.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your established collaborations.
sub_fields.answer:
Great Wave IP bank is a joint-venture between Antler Ibex and Animoca Brands.  Antler Ibex has already engaged with content rights holders in Japan and are in the process of securing 100 anime / manga characters for this project.  The below is the statement of work to integrate Cardano chain with Animoca Moca Network. 



The solution is an **IP Bank**:



1. **Enterprise IP Registry** – Secure off-chain indexing + CIP-68 compliant on-chain metadata modules.

2. **Tokenization Engine** – Fractional/non-fractional IP tokens for licensing, rights management, and derivative tracking.

3. **Licensing Automation** – Smart contract-based, rules-driven royalty flows and permissions.

4. **Enterprise Integration Layer** – API suite to ingest catalogues from rights holders  Sony, Kodansha, Kadakawa, Tatsunopro, Shueisha, Aniplex, and other potential partners.

5. **Cross-Chain Compliance** – Optional modules for ERC-compatible IP representations (read-only mirroring), with Cardano as the authoritative chain of record.

6. Integration (Bridge) to Animoca Moca Network including Tokenization. 

7. Consumer friendly IP discovery with understandable Terms and Conditions for using IP

8. Business oriented dashboards for tracking use of IP



This dramatically reduces licensing friction and opens new monetization paths for creators, publishers, and Japanese entertainment conglomerates or small studios alike.

sub_fields.title: Describe funding commitments.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your funding commitments.
sub_fields.answer: Great Wave IP bank is a joint-venture between Antler Ibex and Animoca Brands.  Antler Ibex has already engaged with content rights holders in Japan and are in the process of securing 100 anime / manga characters for this project.  The below is the statement of work to integrate Cardano chain with Animoca Moca Network.  Ibex & Animoca are commiting in-kind capital to on-board Japanese IP holders into the Great Wave IP Bank

sub_fields.title: Describe your key performance metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your key performance metrics.
sub_fields.answer:
The IP Bank generates continuous and predictable on-chain activity tied to:



1. **Asset Tokenization Events**

    - Every IP entry mints one or more CIP-68 assets

    - Updates to metadata create additional transactions

    - Projected catalog size (Year 1): 1,000–2,500 assets

2. **Licensing Executions**

    - Each license request triggers a smart-contract evaluation

    - Approvals, rejections, and negotiation updates recorded on-chain

3. **Royalty Distribution**

    - Automated contract-based payments per usage type

    - High-frequency micro-settlements for music and character usage

4. **Governance & Permissions**

    - Enterprise multi-sig approvals

    - Rights modifications

    - Derivative approvals logged on-chain



### **Measurable Outcomes (Mandatory KPIs)**



- **Dollar Value of Represented IP:** $500M+

- **IP Assets Tokenized:** 1,000–2,500 individual IP records

- **Enterprise Integrations:** 1 Tier-1 partner + 2 additional publishers

- **Active Rights-Holder Wallets:** 20–50

- **Licensing Transactions Executed:** 10–30 enterprise deals

- **Cross-Chain Sync Events:** 200–500 (view-only)

- **Creator/Partner Onboardings:** 100+ ecosystem contributors



### **Projected On-Chain Transaction Volume Projections (Year 1)**



- **IP Tokenization & Metadata Updates:** 15,000–40,000 transactions

- **Licensing & Contract Executions:** 8,000–25,000 transactions

- **Royalty Distribution Events:** 2,500–6,000 transactions

    

    **Total Year-1 Projection:** **25,500 – 71,000 transactions**

    



These volumes will increase significantly in Years 2–5 as more enterprises are onboarded.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
![](https://i.postimg.cc/26Rxwc4N/ibex-model.jpg)

### **Architecture**
- **On\-Chain \(Cardano\):**
    - CIP-68, CIP-88, CIP-102 token structures for IP assets
    - Royalty and licensing contracts (Plutus V3)
    - Governance hooks (CIP-1694)
    - Identity & KYC optional modules
- **Off\-Chain:**
    - IP catalog ingestion pipelines (Sony, publishers, rights-holders)
    - Encrypted metadata vault
    - License request and negotiation portal
    - Enterprise CRM integration
- **Cross\-Chain:**
    - View-only representations for Ethereum/L2s
    - [Potential Midnight] Zero-knowledge proof modules for rights verification without exposing full metadata

### **6\.2 User Flow**
1. Rights-holder uploads catalog
2. Metadata validated and normalized
3. IP minting into CIP-68 asset class
4. Licensing terms encoded into token rules
5. Royalty streams automatically distributed
6. Third parties (games, studios, creators) request usage
7. Contracts executed on Cardano

### **6\.3 Compliance & Governance**
- Rights provenance guaranteed
- Multi-sig enterprise controls
- Region-based licensing restrictions
- Optional government-verified identity integrations for cross-border deals

- - -


## **7\. Tier\-1 Enterprise Partner**
### **Why Antler Ibex**
Ibex is well connected bringing an enterprise network.

Sony controls:

- Major anime labels
- Music rights catalog (global distribution)
- PlayStation Studios characters
- Aniplex / A-1 Pictures anime IP
- Manga publishing partnerships

### **Partner Commitment \(Antler Ibex and Network\)**
- Catalog access for pilot (initial 100 IP entries)
- Joint architecture definition
- Co-marketing announcement
- Pilot deployment and internal usage

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
## **Expected On-Chain Impact**



### **Transaction Volume Estimate**



Year 1 projections:



- **15,000–40,000 transactions** from IP minting, updates, and metadata events

- **8,000–25,000 licensing-related transactions**

- **Royalty distributions: 2,500–6,000 transactions**



### **Total Tokenized Assets (Year 1)**



- **1,000–2,500 IP assets** (characters, storylines, music stems, anime properties)



### **Total Value Represented On-Chain**



- Estimated **$500M+ notional rights value** (non-financial tokenization)



---



## **10. KPIs**



- **KPI 1:** 1,000–2,500 IP assets tokenized on Cardano

- **KPI 2:** 25k–60k on-chain transactions in first 12 months

- **KPI 3:** 10+ enterprise-level licensing executions using Cardano

- **KPI 4:** Integration with at least 1 major Japanese entertainment conglomerate

- **KPI 5:** Public dashboard showing real-time IP registry statistics



---



## **11. Business Model**



Primary revenue streams:



- Enterprise subscription for registry + dashboards

- Tokenization/minting fees

- Licensing execution fees

- Royalty contract settlement fees

- Data & analytics service for publishers

- Optional cross-chain metadata sync services

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Antler Ibex is the world’s first full-service vertical growth engine for established corporates. Backed by Antler, the world’s most active early-stage VC (with 1,500+ investments globally with $1.2B AUM), and led by a seasoned team of venture and growth specialists, Ibex helps corporates strategically engage with the $3.5 trillion global venture economy to unlock growth (organic, inorganic, and transformational)

# Track Record:
- Delivered innovation programs for leading enterprises, including leading financial institutions
- Proven ability to run structured PoC programs that convert problem statements into validated enterprise pilots.
- Large Network of corporate partners and connections in Japan (Banks, Real Estate companies, Trading houses, and gaming companies)
- Contributed to various Cardano live products from auctions, audits, minting tools, standards, consulting for IOG, etc.

# Team Capability:
- Dedicated Program Manager & Analyst to lead corporate scouting, workshops, and supporting, coordinating PoC Delivery & business case.
- Antler Ibex senior partners to oversee program quality and corporate engagement at the executive level.
- Technical Delivery Partners: Cardano projects, builders and developers to support PoC development and deployment, ensuring PoC meet enterprise-grade standards.
- Genun Games (subsiduary of Ikigai Technologies) has been in Cardano since 2021 and well versed in gaming sector.

# Feasibility:
- Clear 6-month phased timeline with Go/No-Go decision points.
- Bringing in experienced Cardano team authors of royalty standards and shipping other products to mainnet.
- Transparent budget (750K ADA) with co-funding contributions from corporate for PoC development.
- Proven corporate network in Japan already exploring blockchain adoption.
- Established program management, reporting, and accountability processes from running global-scale innovation programs.

In summary: Antler Ibex’s combination of corporate access, delivery experience, and technical capability ensures the program will be delivered with high trust, accountability, and impact for both corporate and the Cardano community.

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
## **Budget Overview**



**Total Ask:** ₳750,000



### **Allocation**



- Engineering (smart contracts, API, platform, crosschain integrations) – 40%

- Enterprise integration + catalog ingestion – 30%

- Legal/compliance/rights analysis – 15%

- PM + reporting – 10%

- Marketing & co-marketing – 5%



No retroactive funding request.



No giveaways or discretionary reward distributions.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
## **Post\-Project Sustainability**
**Enterprise\-grade revenue stability**

- The subscription model and long-term partner engagement create predictable, recurring revenue streams that sustain continued platform development without relying on Catalyst funding.



**High\-leverage adoption through multi\-publisher onboarding**

-  Once the initial enterprise integration is complete, onboarding additional labels or catalogs is low-marginal-cost and high-impact, allowing new publishers, studios, and rights-holders to integrate with minimal additional engineering expenditure.



**Automated licensing and royalty transactions drive continuous on\-chain activity**

- Each licensing request, approval, usage event, and royalty distribution creates measurable Cardano transactions. As catalogs expand across anime, games, music, and film, transaction volume scales independently of Catalyst funding.

**Global catalog expansion unlocks compounding ecosystem benefits**

- A working enterprise framework for rights tokenization opens the door to additional publishers and labels, turning Cardano into a reference chain for entertainment metadata, asset provenance, and cross-border licensing activity.



**Strengthens Cardano’s presence in Japan’s entertainment and IP sectors**

- By working with a partner deeply connected to Japanese publishers, game studios, anime houses, and media rights organizations, Cardano gains early positioning in a sector that controls some of the world’s largest entertainment IP libraries.



**Creates a globally reusable metadata and licensing standard**

- The system formalizes a tokenization architecture for IP rights—CIP-aligned and enterprise-tested—which can be adopted by gaming platforms, music labels, filmmakers, and creative marketplaces.
- This establishes Cardano as the ecosystem standard-setter for digital rights on blockchain.



**High ROI relative to Catalyst investment**

• Catalyst funds a one-time integration, but Cardano benefits from:

– recurring enterprise usage,

– continuous transaction generation,

– additional catalogs onboarded over time,

– expanded market credibility with Tier-1 partners.

• The cost to Catalyst is fixed, but the adoption curve grows exponentially as more IP libraries are added.
